option.pushierpistons.component.title: Pushier Pistons Options
tooltip.pushierpistons.chainstone_type:
Default: Blocks that a Chain is facing into will stick to the Chain.
Axis Check: Chains facing into another Chain will only stick if their axi are the same.
Adjacent Chains: Chains adjacent to the current Chain being evaluated will also stick, if facing the Chain.
tooltip.pushierpistons.storage: Contains options pertaining to Storage Blocks.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_chests:
Whether Chests can be pushed.
Double Chests will stick together.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_chiseled: Whether Chiseled Bookshelves can be pushed.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_shelves:
Whether Shelves can be pushed.
Connected Powered Shelves will stick together.
tooltip.pushierpistons.utility: Contains options pertaining to Utility Blocks.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_furnaces:
Whether Furnaces can be pushed.
This includes Furnace variants.
(i.e, Blast Furnaces & Smokers.)
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_brewing_: Whether Brewing Stands can be pushed.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_enchanti: Whether Enchanting Tables can be pushed.
tooltip.pushierpistons.redstone: Contains options pertaining to Redstone Blocks.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_item_tra:
Whether Item Transporters can be pushed.
(i.e., Hoppers.)
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_ejectors: Whether Ejectors can be pushed.(i.e., Dispensers & Droppers.)
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_daylight: Whether Daylight Detectors can be pushed.
tooltip.pushierpistons.combat: Contains options pertaining to Combat Blocks.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_creaking:
Whether Creaking Hearts can be pushed.
Will instantly kill connected Creakings.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_trial_sp: Whether Trial Spawners can be pushed.
tooltip.pushierpistons.buff: Contains options pertaining to Buff Blocks.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_beacons:
Whether Beacons can be pushed.
Power state does not get saved.
tooltip.pushierpistons.other: Contains options pertaining to Blocks that may have not been listed above.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_beehives:
Whether Beehives can be pushed.
Can cause Bees to lose their home position.
tooltip.pushierpistons.wilderwild: Contains options pertaining to Wilder Wild Blocks.
tooltip.pushierpistons.trailiertales: Contains options pertaining to Trailier Tales Blocks.
tooltip.pushierpistons.netheriernether: Contains options pertaining to Netherier Nether Blocks.
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_nether_r: Whether Nether Reactor Cores can be pushed.
tooltip.pushierpistons.simple_copper_pip: Contains options pertaining to Simple Copper Pipes Blocks..
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_copper_p:
Whether Copper Pipes can be pushed.
This could cause issues, be careful!
tooltip.pushierpistons.pushable_copper_f: Whether Copper Fittings can be pushed.
